Created an attachment (id=48020)
proposed fix

It seems that after the update code is run we are trying to restore the selection on a control without checking to see if the control is disposed or not.
We no longer use the asynchronous tree viewer - it's being phased out in 3.3. Only the memory view and CDT modules view are using it currently, but those will also be phased out.
